name: Kalahari
description:
Kalahari is a fun board game based on Kalah, a game in the mancala family. In this game the goal is to capture more pieces then your opponent. For more information about the game you can check Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kalah

Features:

- Local multiplayer
Play against your friends on the same device, just put it between you like a board game.

- Against AI
Play alone against the computer.

- Statistics
Statistics will be kept for all games you play. All wins, draws and losses will be saved and from that the winrate (%) will be calculated. Stay on top of the local players list!
